events.name: Introduction to Swift & iOS - Hackerschool
events.description:
Learn all about Swift, Apple's new programming language, and build your very first iOS App at our first iOS Hackerschool workshop!

In three hours, we'll cover:

- Learning the essentials of Swift, Apple's new programming  language
- Building a simple iOS App with UI tied to backend logic using Model-View-Controller pattern

Note: Having some programming experience (any language!) would be helpful if you're planning to attend this workshop. You are required to bring along a laptop running OS X 10.11 (El Capitan) so that you will be able to take part in this workshop interactively.

Sign up right now at school.nushackers.org!!
events.location: Seminar Room 3, Town Plaza (Level 2), University Town, National University of Singapore
